amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more than 50 Federal employees at any single conference occurring outside the U.S.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to be used to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more than 50 Federal employees at any single conference occurring outside the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
